Key Observations (Aug–Nov 2025): Oct 2025 election; 98% victory reported; opposition rejection; curfews and protests in Dar es Salaam & Arusha; internet restrictions.
Short-term resilience; SGR investment; Vision 2050 messaging; risk of capital flight amid sanctions rumors.
Polarization between CCM and urban youth movements (Chadema, ACT-Wazalendo); erosion of social cohesion.
Internet blackouts and censorship; diplomatic advisories; GDELT tone around –14 to –18 during election aftermath.
Heavy police/military presence; reports of civilian impersonation of security personnel raising misidentification risks.
Allegations of Kenyan/Ugandan dignitary evacuations; incipient regionalization of crisis.
